message.name: Receive Signal Strength Information
message.description: Measure of the RSSI by a networking device. Indicates the gain or loss in the signal strength due to the transmission and reception equipment and the transmission medium and distance.

field.name: Value
field.description: RSSI measurement.

message.name: SMS Transmit
message.description: Request to send SMS.

field.name: Sequence Number
field.description: Sequence number.

field.name: Destination
field.description: Number or name of the recipient.

field.name: Timeout
field.description: Timeout for sending message.

field.name: Data
field.description: Message data.

message.name: SMS Receive
message.description: Received SMS data.

field.name: Source
field.description: Number of name of the sender.

field.name: Data
field.description: Message data.

field.name: Sequence Number
field.description: Sequence number.

field.name: State
field.description: Current state of an SMS transaction.

message.name: Text Message
message.description: A text message has been received.

field.name: Origin
field.description: Message origin (if known).

field.name: Text
field.description: Message contents.

field.name: Origin Identifier
field.description: The unique identifier of this message's origin device (e.g. lauv-xtreme-2, manta-0).

field.name: Timestamp
field.description: Timestamp (Epoch time).

field.name: Data
field.description: Message data.

field.name: Request Identifier
field.description: The request identifier used to receive transmission updates.

field.name: Time to live
field.description: Time, in seconds, after which there will be no more atempts to transmit the message.

field.name: Destination Identifier
field.description: The unique identifier of this message's destination (e.g. lauv-xtreme-2, manta-0).

field.name: Data
field.description: Message data.

field.name: Request Identifier
field.description: The request identifier used to receive transmission updates

value.name: Error while trying to transmit message
Message has been queued for transmission
Message's TTL has expired. Transmition cancelled.

message.name: Extended Receive Signal Strength Information
message.description: Measure of the RSSI by a networking device. Indicates the gain or loss in the signal strenght due to the transmission and reception equipment and the transmission medium and distance.

field.name: Value
field.description: RSSI measurement.

field.name: RSSI Units
field.description: Indicates the units used for the RSSI value.

message.name: LBL Range
message.description: When the vehicle uses Long Base Line navigation, this message notifies that a new range was received from one of the acoustics transponders. The message fields are used to identify the range value and the transponder name.

field.name: Beacon Identification Number
field.description: Identification number of the acoustic transponder from which the range information was received.

field.name: Range
field.description: Distance to the acoustic transponder.

message.name: LBL Beacon Configuration
message.description: Position and configuration of an LBL transponder (beacon).

field.name: Beacon Name
field.description: Name/Label of the acoustic transponder.

field.name: Latitude WGS-84
field.description: WGS-84 Latitude coordinate.

field.name: Longitude WGS-84
field.description: WGS-84 Longitude coordinate.

field.name: Depth
field.description: The beacon's depth.

field.name: Interrogation channel
field.description: Interrogation channel.

field.name: Reply channel
field.description: Reply channel.

field.name: Transponder delay
field.description: Transponder delay.

message.name: LBL Configuration
message.description: Long Base Line configuration.

field.name: Operation
field.description: Used to define the type of the operation this message holds.

value.name: Set LBL Configuration
value.description: Set the beacons configuration aboard the vehicle.

value.name: Retrieve LBL Configuration
value.description: Request the vehicle to send its current beacons configuration.

field.name: Beacons
field.description: A list of LBL beacon configuration messages.

message.name: Acoustic Operation
message.description: Acoustic operation.

field.name: Operation
field.description: Operation type.

value.name: Abort
value.description: Send an abort through the acoustic channel to the system specified in the field 'system'.

value.name: Abort in Progress
value.description: The latest abort request to the system specified in the field 'system' is in progress.

value.name: Abort Timeout
value.description: The latest abort operation expired without acknowledgment from the system specified in the field 'system'.

value.name: Abort Acknowledged
value.description: The latest abort operation was acknowledged by the system specified in the field 'system'.

value.name: Range Request
value.description: Request a range through the acoustic channel to the system specified in the field 'system'.

value.name: Range in Progress
value.description: The latest range request to the system specified in the field 'system' is in progress.

value.name: Range Timeout
value.description: The latest range request operation expired without reply from the system specified in the field 'system'.

value.name: Range Received
value.description: The latest range request operation to the system specified in the field 'system' was successful and the range is specified in the field 'range'.

value.name: Modem is Busy
value.description: The acoustic modem is busy and cannot execute the requested operation.

value.name: Unsupported operation
value.description: The latest requested operation is not supported.

value.name: Transducer Not Detected
value.description: The transducer was not detected.

value.name: Send Message
value.description: Request message over acoustic channel. The message to send is specified by the 'msg' field.

value.name: Message Send -- Queued
value.description: Message send request has been queued.

value.name: Message Send -- In progress
value.description: Message send request is in progress.

value.name: Message Send -- Done
value.description: Message send request has been fulfilled.

value.name: Message Send -- Failure
value.description: Message send request could not be fulfilled.

value.name: Send Short Message
value.description: Request message over acoustic channel. The message to send is specified by the 'msg' field.

field.name: System
field.description: The meaning of this field depends on the operation and is explained in the operation's description.

field.name: Range
field.description: The meaning of this field depends on the operation and is explained in the operation's description.

field.name: Message To Send
field.description: Argument for message send ('MSG') requests.

message.name: Acoustic Systems Query
message.description: Request a list of known underwater acoustic systems. The recipient of this message shall reply with an AcousticSystems message.

message.name: Acoustic Systems
message.description: This message is sent in reply to an AcousticSystemsQuery message and lists all known underwater acoustic systems (modems, narrow band transponders, etc).

field.name: System List
field.description: Comma separated list of known acoustic system names.

message.name: Acoustic Link Quality
message.description: This message is used to report the perceived link quality to other acoustic peers.

field.name: Peer Name
field.description: The name of the peer on the other side of this link.

field.name: Received Signal Strength Indicator
field.description: RSSI is a signed floating point number. Higher RSSI values correspond to stronger signals. The signal strength is acceptable when measured RSSI values lie between -20 dB and -85 dB.

field.name: Signal Integrity Level
field.description: Signal Integrity value illustrates distortion of the last received acoustic signal. It is calculated based on cross-correlation measurements. Higher *Signal Integrity Level* values correspond to less distorted signals. An acoustic link is considered weak if the *Signal Integrity Level* value is less than 100.

message.name: UamTxFrame
message.description: This message shall be sent to acoustic modem drivers to request transmission of a data frame via the acoustic channel.

field.name: Sequence Id
field.description: A sequence identifier that should be incremented for each request. This number will then be used to issue transmission status updates via the message UamTxStatus.

field.name: Destination System
field.description: The canonical name of the destination system. If supported, the special destination 'broadcast' shall be used to dispatch messages to all nodes.

field.name: Flags
field.description: Transmission flags.

value.name: Acknowledgement
value.description: On modems that support it, this flag shall be used to request an acknowledgment of reception from the receiving node.

value.name: Delayed
value.description: On modems that support it, this flag shall be used to delay the frame transmission until the modem needs to transmit control data (e.g., acknowledgment of reception, etc).

field.name: Data
field.description: The actual data frame to transmit. The data size shall not exceed the MTU of the acoustic modem.

message.name: UamRxFrame
message.description: This message shall be dispatched by acoustic modem drivers each time a data frame is received over the acoustic channel.

field.name: Source System
field.description: The canonical name of the node that transmitted the data frame. If this name cannot be resolved the string 'unknown' shall be used.

field.name: Destination System
field.description: The canonical name of the destination node of the data frame. If this name cannot be resolved the string 'unknown' shall be used.

field.name: Flags
field.description: Reception flags.

value.name: Promiscuous
value.description: The data frame was transmitted to an acoustic modem other than the one the acoustic modem driver is controlling.

value.name: Delayed
value.description: The data frame was transmitted using the DELAYED flag.

field.name: Data
field.description: The actual received data frame.

message.name: UamTxStatus
message.description: This message shall be used by acoustic modem drivers to send updates on the transmission status of data frames.

field.name: Sequence Id
field.description: The sequence identifier of the frame transmission request.

field.name: Value
field.description: Frame transmission status.

value.name: Transmission Completed
value.description: The frame transmission was completed.

value.name: Transmission Failed
value.description: The frame transmission failed. The reason for the failure is given in the field 'error'.

value.name: Transmission Canceled
value.description: The frame transmission was canceled.

value.name: Modem is busy
value.description: The acoustic modem driver is busy and could not honor the frame transmission request at the moment.

value.name: Invalid address
value.description: The canonical name of the destination node could not be resolved.

value.name: In Progress
value.description: The frame transmission is in progress.

value.name: Unsupported operation
value.description: The frame transmission request is not valid for this acoustic modem driver.

value.name: Invalid transmission size
value.description: The frame transmission request exceeds the MTU of the acoustic modem.

value.name: Not transducer
value.description: transducer not connected to the acoustic modem.

field.name: Error Message
field.description: Where applicable this field shall contain a human-readable message explaining the error.

message.name: UamRxRange
message.description: Acoustic range measurement.

field.name: Sequence Id
field.description: The sequence identifier of the ranging request.

field.name: System
field.description: The canonical name of the ranged system.

field.name: Value
field.description: The actual range. Negative values denote invalid measurements.

message.name: UamTxRange
message.description: Request an acoustic modem driver to measure the distance to another system.

field.name: Sequence Id
field.description: A sequence identifier that should be incremented for each request. This number will then be used to issue transmission status updates via the message UamTxStatus.

field.name: Destination System
field.description: The canonical name of the target system.

field.name: Timeout
field.description: Maximum amount of time to wait for a reply.

message.name: USBL Angles
message.description: This message contains information, collected using USBL, about the bearing and elevation of a target.

field.name: Target
field.description: Target's IMC address.

field.name: Bearing
field.description: Target's bearing.

field.name: Elevation
field.description: Target's elevation.

message.name: USBL Position
message.description: This message contains information, collected using USBL, about a target's position.

field.name: Target
field.description: Target's IMC address.

field.name: X
field.description: X coordinate of the target in the local device's reference frame.

field.name: Y
field.description: Y coordinate of the target in the local device's reference frame.

field.name: Z
field.description: Z coordinate of the target in the local device's reference frame.

message.name: USBL Fix
message.description: This message contains the WGS-84 position of a target computed using USBL.

field.name: Target
field.description: Target's IMC address.

field.name: Latitude (WGS-84)
field.description: WGS-84 Latitude.

field.name: Longitude (WGS-84)
field.description: WGS-84 Longitude.

field.name: Z Units
field.description: Units of the z reference.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: Target reference in the z axis. Use z_units to specify whether z represents depth, altitude or other.

message.name: USBL Angles Extended
message.description: This message contains information, collected using USBL, about the bearing and elevation of a target.

field.name: Target
field.description: Target's system name.

field.name: Local Bearing
field.description: Target's bearing in the local device's reference frame.

field.name: Local Elevation
field.description: Target's elevation in the local device's reference frame.

field.name: Bearing
field.description: Target's bearing in the navigation reference frame.

field.name: Elevation
field.description: Target's elevation in the navigation reference frame.

field.name: Roll Angle
field.description: Rotation around the device longitudinal axis.

field.name: Pitch Angle
field.description: Rotation around the device lateral or transverse axis.

field.name: Yaw Angle
field.description: Rotation around the device vertical axis.

field.name: Accuracy
field.description: Accuracy of the fix.

message.name: USBL Position Extended
message.description: This message contains information, collected using USBL, about a target's position.

field.name: Target
field.description: Target's system name.

field.name: X
field.description: X coordinate of the target in the local device's reference frame.

field.name: Y
field.description: Y coordinate of the target in the local device's reference frame.

field.name: Z
field.description: Z coordinate of the target in the local device's reference frame.

field.name: N
field.description: X coordinate of the target in the navigation reference frame.

field.name: E
field.description: Y coordinate of the target in the navigation reference frame.

field.name: D
field.description: Z coordinate of the target in the navigation reference frame.

field.name: Roll Angle
field.description: Rotation around the device longitudinal axis.

field.name: Pitch Angle
field.description: Rotation around the device lateral or transverse axis.

field.name: Yaw Angle
field.description: Rotation around the device vertical axis.

field.name: Accuracy
field.description: Accuracy of the position fix.

message.name: USBL Fix Extended
message.description: This message contains the WGS-84 position of a target computed using USBL.

field.name: Target
field.description: Target's system name.

field.name: Latitude (WGS-84)
field.description: WGS-84 Latitude.

field.name: Longitude (WGS-84)
field.description: WGS-84 Longitude.

field.name: Z Units
field.description: Units of the z reference.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: Target reference in the z axis. Use z_units to specify whether z represents depth, altitude or other.

field.name: Accuracy
field.description: Accuracy of the position fix.

message.name: USBL Modem Configuration
message.description: Position and configuration of an Ultra-Short Base Line modem.

field.name: Modem Name
field.description: Name/Label of the acoustic modem.

field.name: Latitude WGS-84
field.description: WGS-84 Latitude coordinate.

field.name: Longitude WGS-84
field.description: WGS-84 Longitude coordinate.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: Target reference in the z axis. Use z_units to specify whether z represents depth, altitude or other.

field.name: Z Units
field.description: Units of the z reference.

message.name: USBL Configuration
message.description: Ultra-Short Base Line configuration.

field.name: Operation
field.description: Used to define the type of the operation this message holds.

value.name: Set LBL Configuration
value.description: Set the beacons configuration aboard the vehicle.

value.name: Retrieve LBL Configuration
value.description: Request the vehicle to send its current beacons configuration.

field.name: Modems
field.description: A list of USBL modem configuration messages.
